product_name: APPALACHIAN TRAIL CONSERVANCY Appalachian Trail Guide: North Carolina and Georgia - 14th Edition - Guidebook and Maps
long_description: The updated Appalachian Trail Guide: North Carolina and Georgia covers 235 mi. of the Appalachian Trail from Great Smoky Mountains National Park in North Carolina to Springer Mountain, Georgia.
short_description: The updated Appalachian Trail Guide: North Carolina and Georgia covers 235 mi. of the Appalachian Trail from Great Smoky Mountains National Park in North Carolina to Springer Mountain, Georgia.
